dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Fraud site - www.motordealservice.com]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, June 24, 2005 12:46 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; babbey@escrow.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Fraud site - www.motordealservice.com]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Fraud site - www.motordealservice.com
Date: Thu, 23 Jun 2005 08:30:09 -0700
From: Brandon Abbey <babbey@escrow.com>
To: The Planet Policy Enforcement <abuse@theplanet.com>,
<copyright@theplanet.com>
CC: la.ectf.reports@usss.dhs.gov, ifcc33@ic3.gov

It appears you are hosting a fraud site at - www.motordealservice.com



This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com
and its affiliated licensed escrow services providers, Internet Escrow
Services ("IES") and EC Services Corporation ("ECSC").
It has been brought to our attention that your company provides services to
a website, www.motordealservice.com which is infringing on Escrow.com's
intellectual property rights to the material posted on Escrow.com
(www.Escrow.com <http://www.escrow.com/> ).  This site claims an affiliation
with our companies and there is none.  This site has also stolen content
from Escrow.com for the purpose of defrauding consumers attempting to buy
and sell over the Internet.  Please disable this site immediately



Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the
www.motordealservice.com site,
http://motordealservice.com/index.php?action=terms Neither Escrow.com nor
IES has any affiliation with www.motordealservice.com
<http://www.motordealservice.com>  and has a good faith belief that use of
the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent or the law.



The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty of
perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.






Brandon W. Abbey
Managing Director
Escrow.com
16275 Laguna Canyon Road
Irvine, CA  92618
Direct - 949-790-5880
Fax - 949-790-5811



- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCvEbIvK/XpJs6oyURAsaLAKCqvdDSj9piAmapp4wgSzviCbr9jgCeOBS8
2t5SqipVPJBMJr04whhZuZM=
=nQ9L
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
